name: Palm Pilot
description:
Want to see where this project goes? Check out my development updates.

This is a VR platformer I made for the Ludum Dare 38 Compo. Boost around using your hand rockets, and try to make it to the top!

CONTROLS:
Squeeze the trigger, and aim the jet down

Currently only built for the Oculus Rift, but SteamVR support is coming.

I'd love any feedback you can give!

Special thanks to Jake Perry
